name: Spell Grid 2: Word Spelling Game
description:
-- Spell Grid 2 —

Swipe over the letter tiles and try to spell all the valid words in the grid!
Find 3 to 9-letter words.

Need help? Use Clues to discover new words.
Score 25 points in each grid to unlock the Hint Letters.
The Hint Letters will help you to complete the grid for a 50 points bonus.

Play on the Apple Watch!
Tap on adjacent letters to form words and tap the last letter again to submit.
Try to find 10 words in each grid!

What's new in Spell Grid 2 vs Spell Grid 1:

- discover 8 & 9-letter words
- dictionary : check out the word definitions during the game
- auto-saving
- new letter grids
- Apple Watch support

Features:

+ Universal app
+ GameCenter: Beat your high score and compete on the 2 Game Center leaderboards
+ iCloud Sync: Sync your game progress across multiple devices

Are you left-handed? Playing on iPad? You can flip the game screen for a better experience.
